structural_analysis.FrameElements package

Submodules

structural_analysis.FrameElements.TwoDimensionalFrameElement module

Classes:

TwoDimensionalFrameElement

class structural_analysis.FrameElements.TwoDimensionalFrameElement.TwoDimensionalFrameElement(start_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, end_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, section: structural_analysis.section.Section, material: structural_analysis.material.Material, beta_angle=0)

Bases: structural_analysis.FrameElements.element.Element

A class to represent a frame element in 2-d space. Derived from Element Base class. The element has six degrees of freedom, two translational and one rotational degrees of freedom per each node.

local_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

Represents a 2x2 local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix(self) -> np.ndarray:

Represents a 6x6 transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

degrees_of_freedom(self) -> list[_DegreeOfFreedom]:

Returns list of the six degrees of freedom.

shape_function_matrix(self, x) -> np.ndarray:

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

property degrees_of_freedom

Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node.

property elastic_geometric_matrix

for future use of geometric stiffness matrix

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix()

Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

local_stiffness_matrix()

Represents the local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

shape_function_matrix(x)

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

structural_analysis.FrameElements.TwoDimensionalTrussElement module

Classes:

TwoDimensionalTrussElement

class structural_analysis.FrameElements.TwoDimensionalTrussElement.TwoDimensionalTrussElement(start_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, end_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, section: structural_analysis.section.Section, material: structural_analysis.material.Material, beta_angle=0)

Bases: structural_analysis.FrameElements.element.Element

A class to represent a truss element in 2-d space. Derived from Element Base class. The element has four degrees of freedom, two translational degrees of freedom per each node.

local_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

Represents a 2x2 local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix(self) -> np.ndarray:

Represents a 2x4 transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

degrees_of_freedom(self) -> list[_DegreeOfFreedom]:

Returns list of the four degrees of freedom.

shape_function_matrix(self, x) -> np.ndarray:

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

property degrees_of_freedom

Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node.

property elastic_geometric_matrix

for future use of geometric stiffness matrix

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix()

Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

local_stiffness_matrix()

Represents the local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

shape_function_matrix(x)

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

structural_analysis.FrameElements.element module

Classes:

Element (Abstract)

class structural_analysis.FrameElements.element.Element(start_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, end_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, section: structural_analysis.section.Section, material: structural_analysis.material.Material, beta_angle=0)

Bases: abc.ABC

An abstract class to represent an element. …

idint

unique identifier for the element.

start_nodeNode

start node instance of the element.

end_nodeNode

end node instance of the element.

sectionSection

cross-section of the element

_vector: Vector

vector instance from start node to end node described in the structure coordinate system

length: float

length of the element

twist_angle: float

rotation angle of the element around its local x-axis, in degrees.

coordinate_systemCoordinateSystem

local coordinate system of the element. The element lies on the x-axis.

_structureStructure

structure instance containing the element

_geometry_transformation_matrix(self) -> numpy.ndarray:

returns a 3x3 transformation matrix from local coordinate system to structure coordinate system

global_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

returns the element global stiffness matrix in the structure coordinate system

local_mesh_coordinates(self) -> np.ndarray:

returns a 2-d array of local coordinates of points evenly spaced along element.

global_mesh_coordinates(self) -> np.ndarray:

transforms local_mesh_coordinates into structure coordinate system and returns global coordinates.

local_displacement_field(self) -> np.ndarray:

returns local displacements of local_mesh_coordinates points.

global_displacement_field(self) -> np.ndarray:

transforms local_displacement_field into structure coordinate system and returns global displacements.

global_deformed_position(self, scale) -> np.ndarray:

returns global deformed position of an element in structure. Sum of global displacement field and global mesh coordinates.

local_end_displacement_vector(self) -> np.ndarray:

returns displacements and rotations of element start and end node after analysis is completed.

local_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

abstract method to be implemented be derived classes. Represents the local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix(self) -> np.ndarray:

abstract method to be implemented by derived classes. Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

degrees_of_freedom(self) -> list[_DegreeOfFreedom]:

abstract method to be implemented by derived classes. Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node degrees of freedom.

shape_function_matrix(self, x) -> np.ndarray:

abstract method to be implemented by derived classes. Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

abstract property degrees_of_freedom: list[structural_analysis._degree_of_freedom._DegreeOfFreedom]

abstract method to be implemented by derived classes. Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node degrees of freedom.

abstract property elastic_geometric_matrix

for future use of geometric stiffness matrix

abstract element_stiffness_transformation_matrix() → numpy.ndarray

abstract method to be implemented by derived classes. Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

element_subdivisions = 10

transforms local_displacement_field into structure coordinate system and returns global displacements.

global_mesh_coordinates() → numpy.ndarray

transforms local_mesh_coordinates into structure coordinate system and returns global coordinates.

returns the element global stiffness matrix in the structure coordinate system

id = 1

returns a 2-d array of local coordinates of points evenly spaced along element.

structural_analysis.FrameElements.frame_element module

Classes:

FrameElement

class structural_analysis.FrameElements.frame_element.FrameElement(start_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, end_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, section: structural_analysis.section.Section, material: structural_analysis.material.Material, beta_angle=0)

Bases: structural_analysis.FrameElements.element.Element

A class to represent a frame element. Derived from Element Base class. The element has twelve degrees of freedom, three translational and three rotational degrees of freedom per each node.

local_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

Represents a 12x12 local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix(self) -> np.ndarray:

Represents a 12x12 transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

degrees_of_freedom(self) -> list[_DegreeOfFreedom]:

Returns list of the twelve degrees of freedom.

shape_function_matrix(self, x) -> np.ndarray:

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

property degrees_of_freedom: list[structural_analysis._degree_of_freedom._DegreeOfFreedom]

Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node.

property elastic_geometric_matrix

for future use of geometric stiffness matrix

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix()

Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

local_stiffness_matrix()

Represents the local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

shape_function_matrix(x)

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

TrussElement

class structural_analysis.FrameElements.truss_element.TrussElement(start_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, end_node: structural_analysis.node.Node, section: structural_analysis.section.Section, material: structural_analysis.material.Material, beta_angle=0)

Bases: structural_analysis.FrameElements.element.Element

A class to represent a truss element. Derived from Element Base class. The element has six translational degrees of freedom, three per each node.

local_stiffness_matrix(self) -> np.array:

Represents a 2x2 local stiffness matrix in the local element coordinates.

element_stiffness_transformation_matrix(self) -> np.ndarray:

Represents a 2x6 transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.

degrees_of_freedom(self) -> list[_DegreeOfFreedom]:

Returns list of the six degrees of freedom.

shape_function_matrix(self, x) -> np.ndarray:

Returns 3x1 array of local displacements of point, at position x, in the local coordinate system.

Returns list of degrees of freedom of start node and end node.

for future use of geometric stiffness matrix

Represents the transformation matrix of local stiffness matrix in local element coordinates to structure coordinate system.
